About

Flask-Restless is a Flask extension which provides simple generation of ReSTful APIs for database models given as Elixir entities. You are currently looking at the documentation of the development version. Things are not stable yet, but if you have some feedback, let me know.

Useful Links

  • The Flask website
  • The Elixir website
  • The SQLAlchemy website
  • Flask-Restless @ PyPI
  • Flask-Restless @ github
  • Issue Tracker
